Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera!
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing! The most interesting new feature is the smile-detection mode. With that mode on, the shutter doesn't open until the face recognition technology senses that the subject is smiling!One criticism: It has no lens cover, so the lens can easily get dirty and/or broken.

Reviews.Title: great camera.
Reviews.Author: Mulvina L Goodwll
Reviews.Content: I have taken many pictures with this camera. Transferred them to my desktop, and emailed some. The quality of the pictures and the ease of use are fantastic. I had someone with no camera experience take pictures with it . After showing him the off on button, he took some beautiful shots . Great camera,.

Reviews.Title: I Like this camera
Reviews.Author: Brittney Sharrow "BKLSharrow"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera just to carry around and take snap shots of you and your friends. Easy to use. The only down fall is that some pictures do come out a little blurry but other than that it is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: lousy photos
Reviews.Author: James Hauser
Reviews.Content: I know this is a cheap camera, but I expected at least usable photos. I am not looking for high quality, crystal clear photos. I have a dslr for that. I was just hoping for pictures that weren't blurry or super grainy. You have to hold the camera completely steady to get any kind of viewable photo. Even then, in well lit indoor settings, it is very grainy. I think this is simply a penhole camera put inside an oversized plastic case, so they could call it a point-and-shoot.

Reviews.Title: no star review
Reviews.Author: Charles D. Atkinson
Reviews.Content: vivitar is junk! life close to zero battry life no better. needs vivtar software and no memory card. I could go on but enough said "Cavat emptor"

Reviews.Title: good camera!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: this camera takes pretty good pictures. works for a quick point and shoot camera. not great pixel wise for the "pro photographer" and the flash isn't all too too great BUT like i said it works for taking my quick pictures and its easy for the camera beginners.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: ron morton
Reviews.Content: great camera deserves a 5 rating and it is a great price.  I would buy more of them at this price

Reviews.Title: Good for Barbie.
Reviews.Author: Bart B.
Reviews.Content: Should have known just from the price. Totally not worth paying for. Even with the camera and subject perfectly still, the image is off color, with poor contrast. With even a twitch of movement, the picture literally looks like some sort of apparition photo. Comppetely 100% useless photos. I gave it to my five year old to take pictures of her Barbies with, went to the store and bought a decent camera for seventy bucks. I don't blame the seller, they post reviews which reflect the true quality of the camera. I just didn't heed the warnings. That is the sole reason I did not send it back. Should have known better.

Reviews.Title: Very Bad Quality
Reviews.Author: Kristie
Reviews.Content: This "camera" is maybe worth $10, at the most.  Even with flash on, the pictures turn out blurry unless you hold the camera completely still, and even then the pictures are very low-quality.  I can't even imagine how bad they must look on a large computer screen.  I wouldn't know because I returned it right away.  It's amazing they're able to market this as a "digital camera" because I can take better photos using a cell phone.

Reviews.Title: bad gift
Reviews.Author: gift for a friend
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for a friend for a birthday gift and it is not working, it will take 2 tto 3 picture and will not take any more picture after that.How can my friend get a new camera that will work.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.1MP with a 2.7-inch preview screen
Pic Bridge ready with SD card support
4x Digital zoom, face and smile detection, red eye reduction and ant shake features
Can also be used to take video clips
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar 12.1MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch Screen (VT027-RH)
